attributes.action: have Michael Martin resign as Speaker of the House of Commons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Michael Martin has shown his inability to defend Parliament and the public interest several times over the past few years, and frankly it is time he quit.

His attempt to silence MPs over the expenses row and his ineffectiveness in leading change in this controversial area are the latest indicators that he is  not fit for the job.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
